controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Controller
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileController, LoginController

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Main controller class for controlling actions between view and controller. Should not be used for specific control of small subtasks but as a general purpose class for easier model access.
    Version:
    6/2/2014
    Author:
    Nick Ames, Tim Loverin

    • Constructor Detail

      • Controller

        public Controller()
        Creates a new Controller. This is a generic controller that will only supply basic control. For more specific applications use inherited controllers.
        Parameters:
        aConferenceList - The list of conferences.

    • Method Detail

      • addPaper

        public static void addPaper(java.lang.String fileName,
            int x)
        Grabs current users list of papers, and adds the new paper to the end of the list.
        Precondition:
        User has an account with addPaper privilege
        Postcondition:
        Paper is added to the users list of submitted papers.
        Parameters:
        x - the index to add to.
        fileName - name of the file.

        Parameters:

        Postcondition:
